entry.data:
SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING EAST AROUND 5 MPH THIS AFTERNOON

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING, THEN SHOWERS LIKELY AFTER MIDNIGHT
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE UPPER 40S
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING SOUTHWEST AFTER MIDNIGHT
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
COOLER WITH LOWS IN THE MID 20S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING SOUTH IN THE AFTERNOON

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 30S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
